text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day is growing late as Symboli<n>Rudolf and I
head back after our day<n>out.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If you wouldn't mind, there's somewhere<n>I would
like to drop by before we return<n>to the academy.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ¿Estarías dispuesto a acompañarme?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The moon is supposed to be a perfect<n>crescent
tonight, and I hear that the sky<n>will be clear...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf leads me to a shrine<n>located on a
small hill.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
There aren't any buildings or bright<n>lights around
here. We should have a<n>perfect view.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Perfect is right. A beautiful crescent<n>moon shines
brightly in the sky above us.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Rara vez hablo de esto, pero...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
When I was young, I was often called<n>Luna, on
account of the white streak in<n>my hair.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You could hardly imagine it now, could<n>you? But
it suited me then.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I always loved the sound of it, and once<n>I learned
where it came from, I smiled<n>every time I caught
sight of the moon.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...Pero eso está en el pasado ahora.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I left that name behind when I resolved<n>to walk
the path of the Emperor.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Eso no quiere decir que lamente su pérdida,<n>entiendes.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I can't explain why, but... I simply felt<n>that you
ought to know.
choice_data_list: Me alegra que me lo hayas dicho.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I can't explain why, but... I simply felt<n>that you
ought to know.
choice_data_list: Me alegra que me lo hayas dicho.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Me alegra que hayas estado tan dispuesto a<n>escuchar.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Siento... ¿Cómo debería decirlo?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's as if a burden has been lifted from<n>my
shoulders. My heart feels as clear as<n>the night air.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...Deberíamos regresar.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm counting on you, Trainer. Tomorrow<n>and
beyond...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the memory she shared still fresh in<n>my
mind, I quietly swear to stay by<n>Symboli Rudolf's
side.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hah. Be that as it may, call me that in<n>public and
you'll sound like a lunatic.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Call me Luna, and you'll sound like...<n>Pffft. That's
rather good.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Luna... Lunático...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That's some quality wordplay. Perfect for<n>an
inside joke between comrades.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We walk back to the academy under the<n>
moonlight, with Symboli Rudolf stifling<n>giggles all
the while.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Eso... significa mucho para mí.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's reassuring to think that, even after I<n>have
walked my path to its end and<n>made my dreams a
reality...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Aún recordarás quién solía ser.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Sabiendo eso, puedo avanzar con más<n>fuerza.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Symboli Rudolf sonríe bajo la luz de la luna.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I swear to myself that I will stay by her<n>side, come
what may.
